TopicTitle: There really should be Robotic Kerbals

Articles.Content: Just a silly idea... It was while I was joking about with friends when we started talking about my jokey Kerball Fireball XL5 and how the robot in the TV show made us laugh every time even though he only said a few words (on our way home)... Then we came up with the idea of having a Kerbot in KSP. We could send Kerbots to do dangerous missions.... plus they wouldn't take up resources (other than plugging them into the mains to recharge every night hehe). Ooooh and having those scooter things for Kerbals to fly about...

We have one. The others call it 'MechJeb'. But since the real Jeb is either unsatisfied with it's skills or envious about them, it's rarely allowed to actually do the tasks. Maybe the real boring ones, when noone's looking.

I just thought it would be wonderful to have them to make machinma with. Oh and Mechjeb isn't actually a robot... it's an autopilot that is built into the craft. BIG difference here.

They could just add another gender. I dunno how simple or hard that would be.
Infernal Robotics and batteries. Give it a go.
I'm down with this,,, or up with that,,, whatever, Really cool idea! But wait, what are those "scooter things'" your'e referring to?

17 minutes ago, SpacedCowboy said:

I'm down with this,,, or up with that,,, whatever, Really cool idea! But wait, what are those "scooter things'" your'e referring to?

Flying Scooters were often used in Supermarionation shows to avoid having to make the puppets walk.
Ahh, Yeah, Now I know what you're talkin' about! A bunch of puppets flown around by string power (God, I hope there isn't a mod for that)

1 hour ago, SpacedCowboy said:

I'm down with this,,, or up with that,,, whatever, Really cool idea! But wait, what are those "scooter things'" your'e referring to?

Here you go... one Jetmobile.... As used in Fireball XL5. I sooooo want one for my Kerbals heh.

14 hours ago, NeoMorph said:

Here you go... one Jetmobile.... As used in Fireball XL5. I sooooo want one for my Kerbals heh.

Well, will this do?

(Jeb approves.)
